java/liquibase/parser/ChangeLogIterator.java

00001 package liquibase.parser;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00006 import liquibase.parser.filter.ChangeSetFilter;
00007 import liquibase.parser.visitor.ChangeSetVisitor;
00008 
00009 import java.util.Arrays;
00010 import java.util.Collections;
00011 import java.util.List;
00012 
00013 public class ChangeLogIterator {
00014     private DatabaseChangeLog databaseChangeLog;
00015     private List<ChangeSetFilter> changeSetFilters;
00016 
00017     public ChangeLogIterator(DatabaseChangeLog databaseChangeLog, ChangeSetFilter... changeSetFilters) {
00018         this.databaseChangeLog = databaseChangeLog;
00019         this.changeSetFilters = Arrays.asList(changeSetFilters);
00020     }
00021 
00022     public void run(ChangeSetVisitor visitor) throws LiquibaseException {
00023         List<ChangeSet> changeSetList = databaseChangeLog.getChangeSets();
00024         if (visitor.getDirection().equals(ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.REVERSE)) {
00025             Collections.reverse(changeSetList);
00026         }
00027 
00028         for (ChangeSet changeSet : changeSetList) {
00029             boolean shouldVisit = true;
00030             if (changeSetFilters != null) {
00031                 for (ChangeSetFilter filter : changeSetFilters) {
00032                     if (!filter.accepts(changeSet)) {
00033                         shouldVisit = false;
00034                         break;
00035                     }
00036                 }
00037             }
00038 
00039             if (shouldVisit) {
00040                 visitor.visit(changeSet);
00041             }
00042         }
00043     }
00044 }
